headline: JP Morgan Increases Target Price on Huntington Bancshares (HBAN) to $21
summary: Huntington Bancshares Incorporated (NASDAQ:HBAN) is one of the 10 Best Bank Stocks to Buy in 2026. On February 9, JPMorgan analyst Andrew Dietrich raised his target price on Huntington Bancshares by 5.0% to $21 (from $20) and kept his Overweight call on the stock. This TP update comes as JPMorgan updated its models for large-cap […]
